channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- BeaconMedaes TotalAlert Scroll Medical Air Systems web application
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- BeaconMedaes TotalAlert Scroll Medical Air Systems web application

item.title: CVE-2018-7510|2024-09-16T22:20:39.855Z -- ics-cert -- beaconmedaes%20totalalert%20scroll%20medical%20air%20systems%20web%20application
item.description: In the web application in BeaconMedaes TotalAlert Scroll Medical Air Systems running software versions prior to 4107600010.23, passwords are presented in plaintext in a file that is accessible without authentication.
